Name: Simit Paleis
Review Text: Fantastic and tasty d√ºr√ºm. One of the best in Amsterdam for sure. The bread is freshly baked at the moment you order. Extremely good value.

Name: Simit Paleis
Review Text: Excellent veggie borek. Culinary superior to the average Turkish takeaway.

Name: Simit Paleis
Review Text: If you regret eating a doner or turkish pizza at this place, it's because you live abroad and have to hop on a plane to eat it again. I have tried most reputable kebab shops in Amsterdam and Simit truly stands out for its quality ingredients and freshly baked bread.

Name: Simit Paleis
Review Text: You know this place serves good food because there‚Äôs always a line. Epic doner, durum, always makes you happy and wanting to go back. Put everything on it. They also have other warm baked foods, breads, and pastries. Donuts are available sometimes.

Name: Simit Paleis
Review Text: By far the best kip doner durum I've ever had. Proof:

Name: Simit Paleis
Review Text: So delicious and huge portion! I always get the Turkse pizza with d√∂ner en kaas for 6 euros. They add an ample amount of meat, sauce, and fresh crunchy veggies. I love how juicy and flavorful it is! I‚Äôve tried out at least 7 d√∂ner places in ‚Ä¶

Name: Simit Paleis

Name: Simit Paleis
Review Text: For 3 years now, we have been going to this place for the broodje kip doner met kaas (chicken sandwich with cheese). A happy accident, we decided to give this a shot and haven't looked back since. We haven't even tried other doner places ‚Ä¶

Name: Simit Paleis
Review Text: Probably one of the best Turkish bakeries in the Netherlands. Durum bread is freshly baked (unlike other bakeries using store bought wraps), all baked cookies and bread are deliciously good. Its a modest, simple looking bakery on the corner but dont let looks decieve you, try the food and you will come back for more!

Name: Simit Paleis
Review Text: When you are too lazy to cook lunch or dinner, this is the place to go for a cheap doner sandwich. Probably one of the best I've had in town. ‚Ç¨5 for a chicken doner sandwich and a Coke light. Worth every penny. ‚Ä¶
